alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 11:12AM EDT until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .Runoff from heavy rainfall today will cause rises on the Wabash River this week into next week. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this Friday afternoon and continue rising to 17.5 feet Friday, April 01. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
